metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15108 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
spice-vdagent up to and including 0.17.0 does not properly escape save directory before passing to shell, allowing local attacker with access to the session the agent runs in to inject arbitrary commands to be executed.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15108` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

spice-vdagent - 0.17.0-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spice-vdagent package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.17.0-1ubuntu2').
